alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 8:11AM EST until December 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches north of US 20. Additional snow totals of 2 to 5 inches south of US 20. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult if not impossible. Widespread blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact holiday travel. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause power outages. The dangerously cold wind chills between 15 and 30 degrees below zero will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
